ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day the Hour arrives, that Day they will be split up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day the Hour comes they will be separated into categories.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On that Day when the Hour will come to pass, people will be split into groups.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When that day comes, (people) will be separated from one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And on the Last Day – that day they will all separate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And on the Day when the Hour will be established -- that Day shall they be separated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And at the time when the hour shall come, at that time they shall become separated one from the other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when the Hour is come, that day they shall be divided;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: In the day when the Hour cometh, in that day they will be sundered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the Last Hour dawns -- on that Day they will be sorted out:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: On the Day whereon the Hour arriveth, that Day they shall be separated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The day the Hour sets in, they will be divided on that day [in separate groups]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: On the Day that the Hour will be established,- that Day shall (all men) be sorted out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And on the Day when the Hour will be established, that Day shall (all men) be separated (i.e. the believers will be separated from the disbelievers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On the Day when the Hour has come, they will be divided,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when the Hour takes place—on that Day they will separate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the Day the Hour appears - that Day they will become separated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [30:14] And on the Day when the Hour comes, that day (yawma’idhin, is [repeated] for emphasis) they, believers and disbelievers, shall be separated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (In the day) which is the Day of Judgement (when the Hour cometh, that day they will be sundered) a party in Paradise and a party in hell.
